bet module¶

class bet.Bet(amount, outcome)¶

Bases: object

A Bet is an Amount wagered on an Outcome. A Player has to make atleast one Bet to play a Game.

loseAmount()¶

Calculates the Amount lost in a bet.

winAmount()¶

Calculates the Amount won in a bet in case the Outcome of the Game is favourable.
